settings.temp_dir: Temporary directory to store intermediate files (e.g., .temp)
settings.media_source: Source for media like images or videos, can be 'huggingface' or 'Pexels'
settings.tts_source: Source for Text-to-Speech (TTS), e.g., 'TTSEdge' (for Microsoft Azure Text-to-Speech)
settings.news_source: Source for news articles, can be 'newsapi' or 'currentsapi'

youtube.credentials_file: Path to your YouTube credentials file (e.g., C:/path/to/your/client_secret.json)

newsapi.country: Country code (e.g., 'us'). Refer to the API documentation for valid values
newsapi.page_size: Number of articles to fetch per request (e.g., 5)

currentsapi.country: Country code (e.g., 'us'). Refer to the API documentation for valid values
currentsapi.page_size: Number of articles to fetch per request (e.g., 5)

article_settings.image_model: The image generation model to use (e.g., 'dall-e-3', 'gemini')

video_result.aspect_ratio: Video aspect ratio (e.g., '9:16' for vertical or '16:9' for horizontal)
video_result.background_music: Path to background music file (e.g., C:/path/to/your/music.mp3)

elevenlabs.credentials_path: Path to your ElevenLabs credentials file (e.g., .secrets/elevenlabsaccounts.json)

tts_edge.voice: Azure TTS voice option (e.g., 'es-ES-XimenaNeural' for female Spanish voice) you can find more here https://gist.github.com/BettyJJ/17cbaa1de96235a7f5773b8690a20462
tts_edge.speech_rate_adjustment: Adjustment for speech rate, positive values speed up, negative values slow down (e.g., 10)
tts_edge.pitch_adjustment: Adjustment for pitch, positive values increase pitch, negative values lower pitch (e.g., -10)
